## multiplyRowByScalar() function

An elementary row operations which returns a new matrix whose row at `rowIndex` is multipled by `scalar`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function multiplyRowByScalar<S>(matrix: Matrix<S>, rowIndex: number, scalar: S): Matrix<S>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  matrix | <code>Matrix&lt;S&gt;</code> | The original matrix |
|  rowIndex | <code>number</code> | The index of the row to modify |
|  scalar | <code>S</code> | The factor by which to scale the row |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Matrix<S>`

The matrix with the transformation applied
